roleset.name: having a specific blood clotting disorder
roleset.note: Thrombotic thrombocytopenic purpura, aka Moschcowitz syndrome (tiny blood clots throughout the small blood vessels). Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8

example.name: both args
example.text: This 34 yo woman was seen by Dr. Zdazs Xphoq just over a month ago with viral infection -LRB- fever , sore throat -RRB- , and was TTP over thyroid region .
